channel.title: Armor color or something
channel.description:
[code] <entry> <int>1321</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>14</sprite> <type>33</type> <wieldPos>0</wieldPos> <armourPoints>6</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>0</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>0</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry>[/code]
This was why it never was wielable, so i fixed the dragon armor that was in rscd.
But theere something about the sprites: [code] <sprite>14</sprite>[/code] That one is perhaps iron plate + its an freaking color already anyone know how to get it red?

item.title: Armor color or something
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

That isn’t working. i had to add the dragon armor in ItemWieldableDef.xml cuz i couldn’t wear it. i can wear it now but the color isn’t red now.
in itemdef if the hex color red, but the sprite

			<sprite>14</sprite>

Is making it iron color, beacause i had to add it into the ItemWieldableDef.xml i copyed from iron. what i need is to make this sprite

			<sprite>14</sprite>

RED

Read full topic
